pkgmetadata.longdescription: # D2Y Python SDKThe D2Y Python SDK is a convenient and user-friendly library for interacting with the D2Y Exchange API. It simplifies the process of accessing and managing data from the D2Y platform and offers an easy-to-use interface for developers.## InstallationTo install the D2Y Python SDK, use pip:```pip install d2y```## DocumentationFor comprehensive documentation, including getting started guides and detailed examples, please visit our [official SDK documentation](https://d2y.readme.io/docs/getting-started).
